mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE visitor_log( session_id, user_id, ip_address, user_agent, page_url, referer, visited_at ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{userId}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{pageUrl}, #{referer}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) FROM visitor_log WHERE DATE(visited_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM visitor_log WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND DATE(visited_at) = CURDATE() LIMIT 1
